TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PropertyGridEditorPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart
Public NotInheritable Class PropertyGridEditorPart Inherits EditorPart

summary.span: 提供一个编辑器控件，最终用户可以通过该控件编辑相关联的 或服务器控件上的自定义属性。

span.span: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit custom properties on an associated or server control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 提供使用户能够编辑自定义属性上一个通用用户界面 (UI)和服务器控件置于区域。The provides a generic user interface (UI) that enables users to edit custom properties on and server controls placed in zones. 相反，其他控件，如和控件、 仅现有的编辑和面向用户界面的属性从类。In contrast, the other controls, such as the and controls, edit only existing, UI-oriented properties from the class. 就像 Web 部件控件集内有面向工具的区域 (有关详细信息，请参阅类概述)，有面向工具的一部分的控件，并且其中每个必须驻留在工具区域的相应的类型。Just as there are tool-oriented zones in the Web Parts control set (for details, see the class overview), there are tool-oriented part controls, and each of these must reside in a corresponding type of tool zone. 这些类型的 Web 部件控件集内的控件具有两个显著特征：These kind of controls in the Web Parts control set have two distinguishing characteristics: - 它们是启用最终用户进行个性化设置 Web 部件应用程序中的窗体页的主要用户界面的控件的帮助器控件。They are helper controls that enable end users to personalize the controls that form the primary UI of a page in a Web Parts application. - 它们是仅在某些页面显示模式中可见。They are visible only in certain page display modes. 控件是一个特殊的控件，和它将显示出来的仅当 Web 页处于编辑模式，以及时特定或服务器控件的安全提供程序已由用户选择以进行编辑。The control is a special control, and it becomes visible only when a Web page is in edit mode, and when a specific or server control has been selected by a user for editing. 控件和所有其他一样控件，必须驻留在页上的区域。The control, like all other controls, must reside in an zone on the page. > [!IMPORTANT] > 区域只能包含控件，和控件不能放在任何其他类型的区域。An zone can contain only controls, and controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone. 控件的标记与源代码中的属性提供编辑 UI`WebBrowsable`属性 (从类)。The control provides an editing UI for properties that are marked in the source code with the `WebBrowsable` attribute (from the class). 使用此特性标记的属性时控件创建基于该属性的类型的编辑 UI，并使用对象根据需要将每个编辑控件中的值转换为属性的类型。When a property is marked with this attribute, a control creates the editing UI based on the type of the property, and uses a object if needed to convert the value in each editing control to the type of the property. 你还可以添加其他特性，以帮助控件来显示编辑用户界面。You can also add other attributes that help the control to display the editing UI. `WebDisplayName`属性 (从类) 允许你编辑的用户界面中每个控件指定显示的标签的文本。The `WebDisplayName` attribute (from the class) allows you to specify the text for the label that appears with each control in the editing UI. `WebDescription`属性 (从类)，可指定显示为每个控件中编辑 UI 的工具提示的字符串。The `WebDescription` attribute (from the class) allows you to specify a string that appears as a ToolTip for each control in the editing UI. 下表中列出为编辑各种类型的属性而创建的控件。The controls created to edit properties of various types are listed in the following table. |属性类型Property type|创建编辑的属性的控件Control created to edit the property| |-------------------|------------------------------------------| |StringString|| |Int、 Float、 单元Int, Float, Unit|| |BooleanBoolean|| || （包含枚举值的列表） (contains the list of enumerated values)| ||| 类具有属性，用来获取或设置控件的可见的标题文本。The class has a property, which is used to get or set the visible title text for the control. 没有还受保护属性，用于确定页进入编辑模式时是否显示控件。There is also a protected property, which determines whether the control is displayed when the page enters edit mode. 类还具有两个重要的方法，和，该类继承自类，并重写。The class also has two important methods, and , which it inherits from the class and overrides. 方法十分重要，因为它们允许获取和设置之间的字段值的编辑器控件和属性的属性值在控制正在编辑。The methods are critical because they enable getting and setting the property values between the field values of the editor control and the properties on the control being edited. 因为控件允许你编辑仅自定义属性，你将需要其他中 Web 部件控件集用来编辑外观、 布局和行为的控件控件。Because the control allows you to edit only custom properties, you will need the other controls in the Web Parts control set to edit the appearance, layout, and behavior of controls. 其他控件包括、 ，和控件。The other controls include the , the , and the controls. 这些控件应提供编辑所需的大多数编辑功能控件，但如有必要，你还可以创建一个自定义编辑器控件通过继承类。These controls should provide most editing features required to edit controls, but if necessary, you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the class. 有关代码示例，请参阅类概述主题。For a code example, see the class overview topic. > [!NOTE] > 若要提高可访问性，控件呈现在`
`元素。To improve accessibility, the control is rendered within a `
` element. `
`元素进行分组的相关中用于编辑的控件集控制，以及它可以简化这些控件之间的选项卡式的导航，可视用户代理 （如普通 Web 浏览器） 和面向语音的用户代理 （如屏幕阅读软件）。The `
` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software). ## 可访问性Accessibility 默认情况下，对于此控件呈现的标记可能不符合辅助功能标准，如 Web 内容辅助功能准则 1.0 (WCAG) 优先级别 1 准则。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 对于此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明控制在网页上，并使其可以编辑的多个 UI 属性控件。The following code example demonstrates how to declare a control on a Web page, and enable it to edit several UI properties of a control. 下面的代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 一个用户控件，使你能够更改 Web 部件页面上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 网页包含控件和控件，以及对自定义的引用控件。A Web page that contains an control and a control, along with a reference to a custom control. - 一个包含自定义类控件。A class that contains the custom control. - 该示例的工作原理时加载浏览器中说明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 用户控件的源代码来自于另一个主题。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 对于此代码示例正常工作，你需要获取该用户控件从.ascx 文件[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)主题，并在此代码示例的.aspx 页所在的文件夹中的文件的位置。For this code example to work, you need to obtain the .ascx file for the user control from the [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) topic, and place the file in the same folder as the .aspx page in this code example. 下面的代码示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 它包含的声明性引用具有子控件``包含以声明方式引用的元素控件。It contains a declarative reference to an control, with a child `` element that contains a declarative reference to a control. 页引用自定义控件，并使用`Register`程序集指令和``该控件的元素。The page references the custom control, using a `Register` directive for the assembly, and the `` element for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview/CS/propertyGridEditorPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview/VB/propertyGridEditorPartVB.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例的第三部分是一个自定义类名为`UserInfoWebPart`，在 Web 页引用。The third part of the code example is a custom class named `UserInfoWebPart`, which is referenced in the Web page. 请注意包含有关用户的信息的各种属性是所有标记为`WebBrowsable`属性。Notice that the various properties that contain information about a user are all marked with the `WebBrowsable` attribute. 这使控件用于编辑这些属性提供的用户界面。This enables the control to provide the UI for editing those properties. 属性也会标记与`WebDisplayName`特性，来指定的编辑 UI 中每个控件旁边显示的标签文本。The properties are also marked with a `WebDisplayName` attribute, to specify the text of the label that appears next to each control in the editing UI. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#5)] 当加载浏览器中时，选择**编辑模式**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件，以切换到编辑模式。When you load the page in a browser, select **Edit Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 你可以单击的标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头）**用户信息 web 部件**控件，，然后单击**编辑**编辑该控件。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the **User Information WebPart** control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 编辑 UI 可见时，你可以看到控件。When the editing UI is visible, you can see the control. 请注意，控件呈现为每个属性的`UserInfoWebPart`类，基于属性的类型。Notice that a control is rendered for each of the properties of the `UserInfoWebPart` class, based on the type of the property. 如果在编辑 UI 和单击进行某些更改时**应用**按钮，你可以使用**显示模式**下拉列表，以返回页后，可以浏览模式，然后查看编辑更改的完整效果。If you make some changes in the editing UI and click the **Apply** button, you can use the **Display Mode** drop-down list to return the page to browse mode and see the full effect of the editing changes.

MemberSignature.Value: public PropertyGridEditorPart ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: PropertyGridEditorPart();

summary.span: 创建该类的一个新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数是默认值; 没有构造函数声明中类，因此没有特殊的任务不会执行创建类的新实例时。The constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool ApplyChanges ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool ApplyChanges() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ApplyChanges () As Boolean
public: override bool ApplyChanges();

summary.span: 将 控件的值保存到关联 控件的相应属性。

span.span: Saves the values from a control to the corresponding properties in the associated control.

returns.span: 如果将 值保存到 的操作成功，则为 ；否则（如果发生错误）为 。

span.span: if the action of saving values from the to the is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是在上一个关键方法控件。The method is a critical method on a control. 该方法保存用户已设置的值中关联的相应属性的控件控件。The method saves the values a user has set on a control to the corresponding properties in the associated control. 在中引用关联的控件控件的继承属性。The associated control is referenced in the control's inherited property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不能重写方法因为类型密封的以防止从它继承。You cannot override the method because the type is sealed to prevent inheriting from it. 但是，如果你需要编辑各种的过程的更好地以编程方式控制控制属性比控件提供，你可以创建自定义控制并提供此方法的实现。However, if you need more programmatic control over the process of editing various control properties than the control provides, you can create a custom control and provide your own implementation of this method. 有关代码示例，请参阅方法。For a code example, see the method. 方法尝试在公共中关联的自定义属性上设置的值控制，前提是每个这些属性具有`[WebBrowsable(true)]`属性。The method attempts to set the values on public custom properties in the associated control, provided that those properties each have a `[WebBrowsable(true)]` attribute. 用户单击按钮表示为确定或编辑的用户界面 (UI) 中的应用谓词时调用方法。The method is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI). 你可以调用它直接从你自己的代码是否存在需要保存编辑过的值，除了用户操作。You can also call it directly from your own code if there is a need to save the edited values apart from user actions.

exception.span: 尝试设置关联 的属性值时发生错误。

span.span: An error occurred when trying to set the value for a property on the associated .

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void CreateChildControls ();
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void CreateChildControls() cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub CreateChildControls ()
protected public: override void CreateChildControls();
public override string DefaultButton { get; set; }
.property instance string DefaultButton
Public Overrides Property DefaultButton As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ DefaultButton { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 重写从 控件继承的基属性以在设计器中隐藏该属性，并防止它受主题影响。

span.span: Overrides the base property inherited from the control to hide the property from designers and prevent it from being affected by themes.

value.span: 一个字符串，该字符串包含接收 控件中的默认焦点的 控件的 ID。

span.span: A string that contains the ID of the control that receives the default focus in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管此属性是公共的，但它用于此控件的默认呈现，不应从开发人员代码调用。Though it is public, this property is used for default rendering of this control and is not intended to be called from developer code. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool Display { get; }
.property instance bool Display
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Display As Boolean
public: virtual property bool Display { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当某个控件的关联 控件在编辑模式下时是否应显示该控件。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated control is in edit mode.

value.span: 一个布尔值，指示是否应显示该控件。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回`false`如果上基属性的值也是`false`。The property returns `false` if the value on the base property is also `false`. 否则为如果要对其进行编辑的控件不是`null`，则显示控件。Otherwise, if the control to be edited is not `null`, then the control is displayed. 仅当页面处于编辑模式时才应用属性和控件已被选定以进行编辑。The property applies only when a page is in edit mode, and a control has been selected for editing.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void OnPreRender (EventArgs e);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void OnPreRender(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub OnPreRender (e As EventArgs)
protected public: override void OnPreRender(EventArgs ^ e);
protected internal override void RenderContents (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);

protected public: override void RenderContents(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);
public override void SyncChanges ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void SyncChanges() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub SyncChanges ()
public: override void SyncChanges();

summary.span: 检索 控件的值，并更新 控件中用于编辑这些属性值的相应控件。

span.span: Retrieves the values from a control, and updates the corresponding controls used to edit those property values within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是在上一个关键方法控件。The method is a critical method on a control. 它实现方法从基类中，从关联中检索的当前值控制，并更新中的控件使用这些值，以便用户可以对其进行编辑的控件。It implements the method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated control, and updates the controls in the control with those values so a user can edit them. 调用方法每当中关联的值控件可能已更改。The method is called whenever the values in the associated control might have changed. 有关控件，包含控件调用区域方法后立即调用方法，以便中的值控件中的值始终保持同步关联控件。For a control, the zone that contains the control calls the method immediately after calling the method, so that the values in the control are always synchronized with the values in the associated control. 另一种情况其中调用方法时控件进入编辑模式。Another case where the method is called is when a control is entering edit mode.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Title { get; set; }
.property instance string Title
Public Overrides Property Title As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置编辑器控件的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.

value.span: 用作控件标题的字符串。

span.span: A string that is used as the title of the control.

value.span: 默认值是 Web 部件控件集提供的、计算出的控件名称。

span.span: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的标题栏中显示属性值控制当控件是否处于编辑模式可见。The property value is displayed in the title bar of a control when the control is visible in edit mode. 当控件被声明在页中时，你可以设置的值`Title`属性。When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute. 如果未提供标题的值，将提供特定于区域性的默认值。If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is supplied. 属性重写基属性，以便如果没有标题提供值时，默认标题适合于控件可以提供由 Web 部件控件集。The property overrides the base property so that, if no title value is supplied, a default title appropriate to a control can be supplied by the Web Parts control set. ## Examples 此代码示例演示如何使用属性控件。This code example demonstrates how to use the property of a control. 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下面的代码示例演示如何设置标题上以声明方式在网页上的控件。The following code example shows how to set the title on a control declaratively in a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview/CS/propertyGridEditorPartCS.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview/VB/propertyGridEditorPartVB.aspx#2)] 下面的代码示例的下一部分演示如何设置的值属性以编程方式。The next part of the code example shows how to set the value of the property programmatically. 才能持久地保存以编程方式分配的值，将静态变量命名为`editControlTitle`使用时，此值分配给和属性每次初始化该控件，以便回发事件之间保留该值。In order to persist the programmatically assigned value, a static variable named `editControlTitle` is used, and this value is assigned to the property each time the control is initialized, so that the value is persisted between postback events. [!code-csharp[WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview/CS/propertyGridEditorPartCS.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview/VB/propertyGridEditorPartVB.aspx#3)] 当加载浏览器中时，你可以选择**编辑模式**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件，以切换到编辑模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 你可以单击的标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头）**用户信息 web 部件**控件，，然后单击**编辑**开始编辑。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the **User Information WebPart** control, and click **Edit** to begin editing. 当可见的编辑的用户界面 (UI) 时，你可以看到控制和位于其上方的按钮和文本框框。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see the control, and a button and text box positioned above it. 请注意的标题控件是在 Web 页的声明性标记分配给它的值。Note that the title of the control is the value assigned to it in the declarative markup of the Web page. 如果在一些文本中输入的文本框旁边**更新编辑器部件标题**按钮，然后为该控件将更新，然后单击按钮，标题。If you enter some text in the text box next to the **Update EditorPart Title** button, and then click the button, the title for the control is updated.
